entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
